Oral Hygiene Tracker - The toothbrush will also act as a tracker to keep track of how often you brush your teeth, floss, and gargle, giving you an idea of your oral hygiene habits and how to improve them.
Voice Control - The toothbrush will be voice controlled, so you can tell it "start brushing" instead of having to physically push the button.
Portable Charger - The toothbrush will also have a built-in portable charger to give you a boost of power when needed without having to purchase a separate one.
Toothpaste Dispenser - The toothbrush will feature a built-in dispensing mechanism to make it easier to get your toothpaste on your brush.
UV Sterilization - The toothbrush will feature UV sterilization technology to clean and disinfect the brush head, keeping it hygienic and free of bacteria.
